title: Casey Feldman Alternative Breaks Memorial Endowment
description: To provide scholarships for students with financial hardship to participate in the Alternative Breaks Program at the University of Colorado Boulder.  Scholarships may include expenditures related to the program such as travel, lodging, etc.
marketingContent: To provide scholarships for students with financial hardship to participate in the Alternative Breaks Program at CU Boulder. Scholarships may include expenditures related to the program such as travel, lodging, etc.
